name: Lone Night Jumper
description:
This is a small platformer about equipping and combining abilities to continue. It includes light puzzle mechanics, but leans more on the platformer side.

The main focus of this project for me was to finish something and get a feel for the whole process of making a small game, after having worked on some stuff on the side for about a year now, which wasn't really getting anywhere.

I aim to release the full version of this game with about 30 levels and some more abilities around April 10.

If you have any feedback, feel free to let me know. It is very much appreciated.
